name: Naim Audio
overview:
Naim Audio is a leading British audio supplier, with over 35 years of experience in delivering and manufacturing high end audio equipment and products.

Naim Audio products strive to be both aesthetically pleasing as well as being ahead of the market in terms of technology and performance.

Committed to ensuring their “music first” message is conveyed within all parts of the business, constant research and development is undertaken along with stringent testing to make sure all products are to the highest standard.

This can be seen with the collaboration with Bentley in 2008, where Naim Audio designed and manufactured the Naim for Bentley premium audio system to be used within all of their cars.

Naim Audio is a truly world class manufacturer renowned for producing high end audio products.
